com.jshobe.secrethub

Interface SecretHubLibrary

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Library

    public interface SecretHubLibrary
extends Library
    SecretHubLibrary is an interface that provides the JNA mappings to the the secrethub-go native library.

    This interface should not be used directly. Instead, the Client class should be used.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description

        Parameters:

      • Client_Resolve

        String Client_Resolve(SecretHubLibrary.Client client,
                      String ref,
                      PointerByReference errMessage)
        Fetches the value of a secret from SecretHub, when the ref parameter has the format secrethub://<path>. Otherwise it returns ref unchanged, as an array of bytes.
        Parameters:
        client - the client.
        ref - the secret reference.
        errMessage - a pointer where any error message will be stored.
        Returns:
        the secret.

      • Client_ResolveEnv

        String Client_ResolveEnv(SecretHubLibrary.Client client,
                         PointerByReference errMessage)
        Takes a map of environment variables and replaces the values of those which store references of secrets in SecretHub (secrethub://path)
        Parameters:
        client - the client.
        errMessage - a pointer where any error message will be stored.
        Returns:
        the JSON-encoded environment variables with the secrets replaced.

      • Client_Exists

        boolean Client_Exists(SecretHubLibrary.Client client,
                      String path,
                      PointerByReference errMessage)
        Checks if a secret exists at path.
        Parameters:
        client - the client.
        path - the path to the secret.
        errMessage - a pointer where any error message will be stored.
        Returns:
        true if the secret exists or false if not.

      • Client_Remove

        void Client_Remove(SecretHubLibrary.Client client,
                   String path,
                   PointerByReference errMessage)
        Deletes the secret found at path, if it exists.
        Parameters:
        client - the client.
        path - the path to the secret.
        errMessage - a pointer where any error message will be stored.

      • Client_Write

        void Client_Write(SecretHubLibrary.Client client,
                  String path,
                  String secret,
                  PointerByReference errMessage)
        Writes a secret containing the contents of secret at path.
        Parameters:
        client - the client.
        path - the path to the secret.
        secret - the value of the secret.
        errMessage - a pointer where any error message will be stored.
